radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent atelectasis in the lung bases; 3 mm pleural-based nodule in the left base; no consolidation or pleural effusion; normal liver, spleen, pancreas, adrenal glands, and kidneys; fluid-filled appendix measuring 11 mm; moderate to large fecal load in the ascending colon; no free fluid in the right lower quadrant; minimally thickened bladder wall.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Dilation of the appendix has slightly increased compared to the prior exam.
